projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: INTELLECTIFY ONLINE TECH-EDUCATION LEARNING
projects.bodyText:
- A Tech Education web app made using **React** for **B.Tech**, **BCA** Students.
 - Intuitive Navigation: Simplifies user interaction and course discovery.
 - Enhances user engagement and makes tech education more accessible and enjoyable..

projects.title: Stone Paper Scissors
projects.bodyText:
- **Rock, Paper, Scissors**.
 - The familiar game of Rock, Paper, Scissors is played like this:
 -at the same time, two players display one of **three symbols**: a rock, paper, or scissors.
 - A rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper by cutting it, and paper beats rock by covering it

projects.title: Customer Management App
projects.bodyText:
- A Web Application that allows users to fill texts in a boxes.
 - End to End encryption Algorithm and Authentication.
 - **Table**  to store data.

projects.title: TicTak Toe Game
projects.bodyText:
- The Tic Tac Toe game provides a fun, interactive experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. 
 - showcasing essential **web development** skills with a **responsive interface**

projects.title: Car Rental System
projects.bodyText:
- A Java Web App that leads Car Rental System simplifies the **rental process** by efficiently managing bookings, **vehicle details**, and **customer information**.
 - It include rental dates, bike numbers, number of people, and **license verification**.

projects.title: Temperature Converter
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Temperature Converter web app made with **javaScript**.
 - Uses ** to convert temperature form **Celsius** to **Fahrenheit** and etc..

projects.title: Real Estate Web App
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Real E-State.
 - Uses A real estate web app simplifies **property searches**, providing users with easy access to listings and **real-time** data for informed decisions.

projects.title: Quiz Engine
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Quiz solve Application using **Java**.
 - The main objective of ONLINE QUIZ is **to efficiently evaluate the candidate thoroughly through a fully automated system that not only saves lot of time but also gives fast results**
